titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NODAL STATUS OF TUMOUR NUMBER OF LYMPH NODES SAMPLED - Description

div.p: NODAL STATUS OF TUMOUR NUMBER OF LYMPH NODES SAMPLED is the total number of lymph nodes sampled during Biopsy and treatment procedures, including axillary and others.
NODAL STATUS OF TUMOUR NUMBER OF LYMPH NODES SAMPLED applies to invasive cancers only.
